1.0.name: wordpress/catholicjukebox-radio-lists
1.0.description: This widget gives you the ability to show the Recently Played or Top 5 Requests of the past 7 days for CatholicJukebox.com Radio, located at http://www.catholicjukebox.com - the listings include the cover art if available, along with a link to the artist's song listing page so listeners can make requests online. There is a link at the bottom of the list to launch the radio station webpage.
